name: Stego Program
description: Command-line steganography program to hide and extract arbitrary binary files within 8-bit grayscale BMP images by using a simple run-length encoding (RLE) scheme on each pixels LSB.

name: TracerFIRE Competition
description: Placed 2nd out of 16 in the TracerFIRE cybersecurity competition hosted by Sandia National Laboratories, focused on digital forensics and incident response, utilizing tools such as Elastic, Velociraptor, Malcolm, Detect It Easy to uncover the story of a simulated company's live cyber attack.

name: Cloud-Based SIEM
description: Built a cloud-based SIEM/SOC lab using Azure and Microsoft Sentinel. Deployed a public-facing Windows VM to capture real-world attack logs, recorded 90,000+ failed authentication attempts in 12 hours, and performed threat hunting using KQL queries and geolocation data.

name: Homelab
description: A homelab environment built using Proxmox VE and virtual machines running a simulated enterprise environment.
